require 'oci8'
OCI8.properties[:tcp_connect_timeout] = 2 #10 OCI8.properties[:connect_timeout] = 3 #15 OCI8.properties[:send_timeout] = 60 OCI8.properties[:recv_timeout] = 60
ss = [ "sys/sys@10.10.30.44/orcl as sysdba" ]
1000.times do ss.each do |i| print i, ' ' db=res=nil begin db = OCI8.new i res = db.exec "select instance_name from v\$instance" print res.fetch res.close db.logoff rescue => e print e.message end puts end sleep 0.01 end
